mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_devices (dvc_name, dvc_serial, dvc_buy, dvc_explan, dvc_created, dvc_updated) VALUES (#{dvcName}, #{dvcSerial}, #{dvcBuy}, #{dvcExplan}, #{dvcCreated}, #{dvcUpdated})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_devices SET dvc_name = #{dvcName}, dvc_serial = #{dvcSerial}, dvc_buy = #{dvcBuy}, dvc_explan = #{dvcExplan}, dvc_created = #{dvcCreated}, dvc_updated = #{dvcUpdated} WHERE dvc_seq = #{dvcSeq}
